00078 //
00079 //! associe le champ de diffusivite
00080 void Eval_Darcy_VEF_Face::associer(const Champ_Don& diffu)
00081 {
00082   int nb_faces_tot = la_zone.valeur().nb_faces_tot();
00083   db_diffusivite.resize(nb_faces_tot,Array_base::NOCOPY_NOINIT);
00084   diffusivite_ = diffu.valeur();
00085   mettre_a_jour();
00086 }
00087 
00088 void Eval_Darcy_VEF_Face::associer(const Champ_Inc& v)
00089 {
00090   vitesse = v;
00091 }
00092 
00093 inline void Eval_Darcy_VEF_Face::mettre_a_jour()
00094 {
00095   int nb_faces_tot = la_zone.valeur().nb_faces_tot();
00096   if (sub_type(Champ_Uniforme,diffusivite_.valeur()))
00097     {
00098       db_diffusivite = diffusivite_.valeur()(0,0);
00099     }
00100   else
00101     {
00102       const DoubleTab& val_diff = diffusivite_.valeur().valeurs();
00103       const IntTab& face_vois = la_zone.valeur().face_voisins();
00104       const DoubleVect& volumes = la_zone.valeur().volumes();
00105       db_diffusivite = 0.;
00106 // Compute nu(fac)=(nu(elem1).vol(elem1)+nu(elem2).vol(elem2))/(vol(elem1)+vol(elem2))
00107 // Viscosity at face is the volume weighted average of viscosity on elements
00108       for (int fac=0; fac<nb_faces_tot; fac++)
00109         {
00110           int elem1 = face_vois(fac,0);
00111           int elem2 = face_vois(fac,1);
00112           double vol = 0;
00113           if (elem1!=-1)
00114             {
00115               db_diffusivite(fac) += val_diff(elem1)*volumes(elem1);
00116               vol += volumes(elem1);
00117             }
00118           if (elem2!=-1)
00119             {
00120               db_diffusivite(fac) += val_diff(elem2)*volumes(elem2);
00121               vol += volumes(elem2);
00122             }
00123           db_diffusivite(fac) /= vol;
00124         }
00125     }
00126 }
00127 
00128 // Compute -mu.psi.U/K.dvol
00129 inline void Eval_Darcy_VEF_Face::calculer_terme_source(int num_face, DoubleVect& source, const DoubleVect& volumes) const
00130 {
00131   int size=source.size();
00132   for (int i=0; i<size; i++)
00133     source(i) = -db_diffusivite(num_face)/modK->getK(porosite)*volumes(num_face)*porosite_surf(num_face)*(vitesse->valeurs()(num_face,i));
00134 }
00135 
00136 inline void Eval_Darcy_VEF_Face::calculer_terme_source_standard(int num_face, DoubleVect& source) const
00137 {
00138   calculer_terme_source(num_face, source, volumes_entrelaces);
00139 }
00140 inline void Eval_Darcy_VEF_Face::calculer_terme_source_non_standard(int num_face, DoubleVect& source) const
00141 {
00142   calculer_terme_source(num_face, source, volumes_entrelaces_Cl);
00143 }
00144 inline double Eval_Darcy_VEF_Face::calculer_terme_source_standard(int num_face) const
00145 {
00146   Cerr << "Eval_Darcy_VEF_Face::calculer_terme_source_standard(int num_face) can't be used on a vector source term." << finl;
00147   Process::exit();
00148   return 0;
00149 }
00150 inline double Eval_Darcy_VEF_Face::calculer_terme_source_non_standard(int num_face) const
00151 {
00152   Cerr << "Eval_Darcy_VEF_Face::calculer_terme_source_non_standard(int num_face) can't be used on a vector source term." << finl;
00153   Process::exit();
00154   return 0;
00155 }
